owner.username: Mississippi Department of Archives and History

title._content: Mississippi State Department of Health Photograph Album, ca. 1930s

description._content: Collection: Health Department Photograph Album Call number: Series 2176 System ID: 73650. Link to the catalog Two photograph albums depicting general health activities throughout the state. The books are virtually identical, with black and white 5x7 prints. As arranged in the books the subjects are: State Tuberculosis Sanatorium and Preventorium, Medical and Popular Health Education, Malaria, Dental Hygiene, Maternity Center, Midwifery, Protection against Communicable Diseases (immunizations), Child Health Day Program, Home Visits by Public Health Nurses. The albums have been marked "A" and "B;" Album A contains 68 images, Album B contains 63 images. Album A is inscribed "Underwood" and "Board of Health Library" on the inside front cover. The photographs are not dated, but were probably taken in the 1930s. Please see our profile page for information on ordering. Credit: Courtesy of the Mississippi Department of Archives and History
